== Video Overview ==

The video details the configuration and use of instant messaging clients.

== Target Audience ==

* Users who already have instant messaging accounts and would like to use them under Linux.

== Pre-requisites ==

* Accounts and passwords for instant messaging systems (Google Talk, MSN, Yahoo! IM, AIM, ICQ)

== Required Knowledge ==

* None.

== Recommended Knowledge ==

* The instant messenger names of your friends.

== Objectives ==

* Describe the different applications available for talking on IM systems.
* Configure IM clients.
* Use IM clients.
